sentences.sContent: I needed to be with people who admired my long hair and troubadour credentials, you see.
sentences.sContent_eng: I needed to be with people who admired my long hair and troubadour credentials, you see.
sentences.sCn: 因为我想要与赞赏我的长头发的人在一起，然后让他们看到我真的是一位有实力的行呤歌手。

trans.tranOther: a type of singer and poet who travelled around the  palaces  and castles of Southern Europe in the 12th and 13th cen-turies
